name: math-functions
title: Math Functions
description: Evaluate mathematical expressions with real-time results. Supports common functions like sum, gcd, lcm, trigonometry, and more. Type expressions and press Enter to copy results.
author: jesper_sjoberg

commands.name: math-functions
commands.title: Math Functions
commands.description: Evaluate mathematical expressions with intelligent auto-completion and instant results

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
